desc:
An animation that is a proxy for another animation.

A proxy animation is useful because the parent animation can be mutated. For example, one object can create a proxy animation, hand the proxy to another object, and then later change the animation from which the proxy receives its value.
name: animation.ProxyAnimation

methods.desc:
Creates a proxy animation.

If the animation argument is omitted, the proxy animation will have the status AnimationStatus.dismissed and a value of 0.0.
methods.example:
Implementation

ProxyAnimation([Animation<double> animation]) {
  _parent = animation;
  if (_parent == null) {
    _status = AnimationStatus.dismissed;
    _value = 0.0;
  }
}
methods.name: ProxyAnimation

methods.desc: Called when the number of listeners changes from zero to one.
methods.example:
Implementation

@override
void didStartListening() {
  if (_parent != null) {
    _parent.addListener(notifyListeners);
    _parent.addStatusListener(notifyStatusListeners);
  }
}
methods.name: didStartListening

methods.desc: Called when the number of listeners changes from one to zero.
methods.example:
Implementation

@override
void didStopListening() {
  if (_parent != null) {
    _parent.removeListener(notifyListeners);
    _parent.removeStatusListener(notifyStatusListeners);
  }
}
methods.name: didStopListening

methods.desc: Returns a string representation of this object.
methods.example:
Implementation

@override
String toString() {
  if (parent == null)
    return '$runtimeType(null; ${super.toStringDetails()} ${value.toStringAsFixed(3)})';
  return '$parent\u27A9$runtimeType';
}
methods.name: toString

props.desc:
The animation whose value this animation will proxy.

This value is mutable. When mutated, the listeners on the proxy animation will be transparently updated to be listening to the new parent animation.
props.name: parent

props.example:
Implementation

@override
AnimationStatus get status => _parent != null ? _parent.status : _status;
props.name: status

props.example:
Implementation

@override
double get value => _parent != null ? _parent.value : _value;
props.name: value
